entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
